articleContent:
Dear Rover,
To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.1: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls.
During the maintenance, you will not be able to log in to the game. Please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]
✦Maintenance Time: 2025-02-13 04:00 - 2025-02-13 11:00 (UTC+8)
✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2
✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-02-13 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.
※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

[How to Update]
Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.
✦PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."
✦Android: Launch the game then follow the instructions in the update pop-up window.
✦iOS: Update the game in the App Store.
✦PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update

[PC Pre-download]
✦PC Pre-download Start Time: 2025-02-11 09:30 (UTC+8)
※With the pre-download feature enabled, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the Launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the material for the latest version. You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.
※The pre-download package is about 45 GB in size. To ensure smoother decompressing and installing processes, it is recommended that you have at least 60 GB of spare storage space on your PC.

[Version 2.1 Preview]
✦New Resonators
5-Star Resonators: Phoebe, Brant
✦New Weapons
5-Star Weapons: Luminous Hymn, Unflickering Valor
4-Star Weapon: Ocean's Gift
✦New Regions
Vault Underground, Riccioli Islands
✦New Echoes
Rage Against the Statue, Golden Junrock, Calcified Junrock, Aero Prism, Hurriclaw
✦New Events & Gameplay Features
Special Events:
[Old Man and the Whale] Fishing Adventure Event
[Tactical Simulacra Ⅲ] Featured Combat Event
[Infinite Battle Simulation Ⅱ] Featured Arena Combat Event
[Beyond the Waves] Featured Exploration Event
[Apex Ragunna] Featured Co-op Overdash Event
[Gifts of Blue Water] 7-Day Login Event
 
New Gameplay Features:
[Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways] New Weekly Combat Gameplay
[Whimpering Wastes] New Permanent Challenge Gameplay

✦New Stories
Brant's Companion Story "Sail Day, Captain!"
Exploration Quest "Silent as a Falling Leaf"

✦Other New Content
New "Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain" Challenge: Hecate
New Weapon Projection: Projection - Ocean's Gift
New Phantom Echo: Phantom - Lorelei

※5-Star Resonator Phoebe is available in the [With Hushed Whispers] Featured Resonator Convene. 5-Star Resonator Brant is available in the [Blaze Across the Deep] Featured Resonator Convene.
※Participate in ""Old Man and the Whale"" to obtain 4-Star Weapon ""Ocean's Gift,"" Weapon Projection ""Projection - Ocean's Gift,"" and Phantom Echo ""Phantom - Lorelei.""
※For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 2.1: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.

[Device Requirements]
To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:

①Minimum
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I5 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 2700; [GPU] Geforce 1060/RX570/Intel ARC A380, [RAM] 16 GB or more

②Recommended
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon Gen1+/Gen2/Gen3 or MediaTek processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 15 or later; [Model] iPhone 13 or newer, iPad with A15 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I7 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 3700, [GPU] Geforce 2060/RX5700XT/Intel ARC A750; [RAM] 16 GB or more

③Required Storage Space
Android/iOS: 25 GB
PC: 60 GB; it's recommended to install the game on an SSD.
PS5™: Please make sure your device has sufficient available storage to complete the update successfully.

④Controller Support
Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on Mobile.
Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualShock®4, DualSense®, DualSense Edge™
Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on PC.
Wired/Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualSense®、DualSense Edge™ 
Wired Controllers: DualShock®4
